value.title: tiat (the intersection of art & technology)
value.description:
About Event

​Join us for an evening with the SF Port team to talk San Francisco's Water Futures.

​[updates tba]

​𓆝 𓆟 𓆞 𓆝 𓆟

​Water Futures is an exhibition bringing together Bay Area artists, technologists, and cross-disciplinary makers to explore what it means to live as bodies of water with ecosystems, infrastructures, and histories beyond ourselves. Through immersive, interactive, and multisensory works that move, drip, erode, freeze, and respond, the exhibition traces how water shapes mem
